title: e-Laborate Mobile Application
description: An educational platform developed as the final project of Bangkit Academy.
detailedDescription: Final team project at Bangkit Academy 2023 Batch 1. Backend developed with Node.js and Google Cloud services.

title: IoT-Based Safe with Fingerprint Sensor & GPS
description: A safe system using fingerprint, keypad, and GPS tracker.
detailedDescription: Designed with Altium Designer for schematic and PCB, programmed with Arduino, and assembled using acrylic casing.

title: Final Thesis - IoT Safe with Telegram Alert
description: Safe system that sends alerts via Telegram using ESP32-CAM.
detailedDescription: Includes backup battery power and remote notification functionality using Telegram bot integration.

title: Prana CBT Website Design
description: Prototype design for CBT (Computer-Based Test) platform for teachers and students.
detailedDescription: Designed interfaces like homepage, login, dashboard, and more using Figma.

title: Web-based Discussion Room Borrowing
description: Web platform for booking discussion rooms.
detailedDescription: Built architecture diagrams and used black box testing to validate system functions. Managed tasks via Notion.

title: E-Commerce Website
description: Web-based e-commerce system for product catalog and checkout.
detailedDescription: Includes planning diagrams, class and sequence diagrams, and testing using black box methodology.

title: Komunitas Cosplay Website Design
description: Website interface design for a cosplay community platform.
detailedDescription: Designed homepage, account registration, and login pages using Figma.

title: e-IANC Website Homepage Design
description: Homepage interface design for e-IANC website.
detailedDescription: Prototyped and documented homepage interface using Figma.
